text: Smrjene () is a settlement in the hills south of Pijava Gorica in the Municipality of Škofljica in central Slovenia. It is made up of three hamlets: Brezje, Rupnice, and Smrjene. The municipality is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Škofljica municipal site ==References== ==External links== *Smrjene on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Škofljica
title: Smrjene
